attributes.action:
REPATRIATION PETITION.
 PEOPLE COMING INTO BRITAIN WHO DO NOT RESPECT THE LAW
attributes.additional_details: OVER THE PAST 10 YEARS THERE HAS BEEN A MASSIVE INFLUX OF PEOPLE FROM MANY COUNTRY'S OUT SIDE OF BRITAIN WHO COME FROM MANY DIFFERENT CULTURES, MANY HAVE FITTED IN WELL WITH OUR LAWS AND CULTURE, HOWEVER THERE HAS BEEN MANY FROM FAR OFF COUNTRY'S WHO HAVE A CULTURE WHERE IT IS NOT ACCEPTABLE HERE IN BRITAIN AND IS CRIMINAL UNDER BRITISH LAWS, THESE PEOPLE HAVE CREATED AN AIR OF  UNREST AND HAVE CLEARLY STATED THEY WILL NOT INTEGRATE INTO BRITISH WAY OF LIFE OR ACCEPT BRITISH LAWS.
attributes.background: ANY PERSON WHO COMES INTO BRITAIN AND IGNORES THE BRITISH LAWS AND CULTURE AND WHO DOES NOT INTEND TO INTEGRATE AND SHARE THESE VALUES, ALSO WHO INTENDS TO INCITES UNREST BETWEEN THE INDIGENOUS PEOPLE SHOULD BE MADE TO BE SENT BACK TO THEIR HOME COUNTRY AGAIN UNDER THE GOVERNMENTS RULE OF LAW

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
